subject: Re: Franks statement is true,
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
All I know about 2012 worth remembering is that different people say a bunch of different cultures all point toward something happening in  2012... ****if**** this is true, then that's some crazy-*** **it, indeed!!  The other thing I heard about it is that nasa-confirmed the sun's going to be throwing some temper tantrums worse than usual....  personally, if it makes the power go out, I'm all for it, our modern pace is way to fast, unnatural and stressful... as far as rioting and looting, I'll leave that to the idiots who still believe they can eat, drink and sleep money :)  If I have to break my veganism at that point, I will be well justified in doing so, I'll be the first one out there hunting deer if I have to... and if a giant asteriod is supposed to land on my a** in 2012, then I'm not even going to worry about it till then, lol!

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> David the Tech, says, "Frank is right!"  and that things may  happen before 
> 2012,  and if we are drawn into war, we may not come out the  winner.   
> Frank Sumption said:  " I suggest y'all do a  little research into 2012, and 
> try to get your
> > > spiritual houses in  order." sf
>
